scripts.build: handlebars -m public/src/pages/main-page/main-page.hbs -f public/build/main-page.js && handlebars -m public/src/pages/login/login.hbs -f public/build/login.js && handlebars -m public/src/pages/register/register.hbs -f public/build/register.js && handlebars -m public/src/components/header/header.hbs -f public/build/header.js
